titleInfo.title: West End Church of Christ, City Beautiful Scrapbooks, 1957, Vol. 2 p. 104-105

mods.identifier: City Beautiful Vol 2 p104-105 West End Church of Christ 1957 002

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Photograph of West End Church of Christ, located at 3528 West End Avenue. The church was a participant in the City Beautiful Commission's annual "Clean-Up, Paint-Up, Fix-Up" campaign in 1957. Photographer unknown. Photograph used by the City Beautiful Commission of Nashville, Tennessee, 1957. The City Beautiful Commission was established by the Mayor and City Council in June of 1953, for the purpose of improving the sanitation, cleanliness, and overall appearance of the City of Nashville. The Commission later became a division of Metro Parks in 1975, and then a part of the Metro Public Works division in 2005. Forms part of the City Beautiful Commission Scrapbook Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
